abstract: "Death Comes to Pemberley" involves Elizabeth Bennet in a murder investigation.
snippet: "Death Comes to Pemberley" involves Elizabeth Bennet in a murder investigation.
lead_paragraph: In one of the more recent sequels to "Pride and Prejudice," Elizabeth Bennet does battle with zombies, so it's no great stretch to imagine her as a Regency-era crime sleuth. But the author who has done so is, of all people, P. D. James, the 91-year-old monarch of British crime fiction, better known for her novels about Adam Dalgleish, the brainy Scotland Yard detective who writes poetry on the side.

headline.main: P. D. James Writes a 'Pride and Prejudice' Sequel (but No Zombies)
